ResBaz Sydney 2021

About ResBaz

Conference

Sydney's Research Bazaar is a free, 4 day online festival and conference where researchers come together to up-skill in next generation digital research tools and scholarship. In the spirit of a marketplace or bazaar, ResBaz is a highly participatory event where researchers from many different disciplines can learn, share knowledge and skills, and have fun.

350+
attendees

from everywhere

48+
hours

of researher trailing

20+
speakers

from country and beyond

3
parallel tracks

plus HPC day
